++ System Tray

The ST is an InterfacePanel of the SystemInterface that gives quick reference or access to:
    * running [Applications]
    * [BackgroundTask]s
    * [Hardware]

The ST is under the UserRule, UserPower and NoPersonalAccess rules and software may not add itself inadventently as is common on ConventionalSystems.

++Architecture

The SystemTray uses 

    * AnimatedInterface
